bestPractices: Use for global navigation and primary actions; keep content concise to avoid overcrowding.
Keep the bar sticky only when it benefits navigation; avoid stacking multiple sticky bars.
Ensure contrast and focus styles for interactive items meet accessibility.
Balance icon vs text: label primary actions, reserve icon‑only for well‑known actions.
Coordinate with Drawer and Surface offsets so content doesn’t sit underneath.
Group navigation buttons with the `navigation` prop so they sit inline and respond to available space.
